com.bandyer.core_av.publisher

Interface Publisher

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Recordable, RoomActor

    public Publisher
extends RoomActor, Recordable

    This class represents a publisher of a stream. A publisher is someone who is in read-write mode on a stream.

    The publisher needs a capturer ( audio/video ) to be able to fetch the data to stream.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Publisher.DefaultImpls
      This class represents a publisher of a stream. A publisher is someone who is in read-write mode on a stream.

      • setCapturer

        Publisher setCapturer(Capturer capturer,
                      MuteStreamOption muteOption)

        Method to set the capturer to be used, and the additional options such as mute a channel

        Parameters:
        capturer - can be CapturerCameraAV/CapturerAudio/CapturerCameraVideo
        muteOption - option to mute a channel that is being captured
        Returns:
        Publisher
